column5: MRNA TWST Do you foresee in this year a mini frenzy of MA around the gene therapy or even the cell therapy companiesMr Singh I dont I still have a lot of friends in the BD business development space The RNA space is probably more amenable ALNY has actually had a couple of projects outlicensed and MRNA which I am covering has had earlystage products outlicensed to MRK and to AZN To me thats always a good signWhat I hear about gene therapy just from industry folks in the business development space is that the manufacturing problems there are so huge and so much money has to be put in there and those manufacturing issues might not be able to be solvedtwstcominterviewthefirs

PIRS I am quite sure AZN knew exactly what they were buying when spending millions with this company Stop having constipation because the stock went down 4 cents and chill If you have no patience its cool invest in bitcoin futures to get your daily rocks off This is obviously not the stock for you
SYBX If you like this stock check out MCRB collaboration with AZN and Hersheys science
